resources.string:
INSTRUCTIONS
You will be entering a series of dates and times across the 3 interfaces. You will be doing this over 2 different rounds. For each round, we will ask you to complete 4 trials.

For each trial in both rounds, select the date and time as accurately as possible. Press ok when finished. 

For each of the 4 trials, you will be provided with a different date and time. If you forget, the date and time will be listed at the top of your screen.
